Job Description: Job Description    We are looking for trainee developers who have completed any engineering graduation with the below-mentioned criteria. You will be responsible for Software developer wherein you will be concerned with facets of the software development process, including the research, design, programming, and testing of computer software.   Graduation should be completed in the last three years with a first-class grade  Overall % in SSC & Intermediate should be higher than 80%  Training/Exposure in skills like HTML 5, CSS, JS, and programming languages like PHP, dotnet, etc.  Working knowledge of graphic editing software.
